extensionDescription.message: Set open tabs aside in a collection and restore them later.

defaultBrowserActionTitle.description: Title of the browser action button.

showTabsMenuItem.description: Title of the menu item for opening the sidebar action for managing tabs which were set aside.

emptySidebarMessage.description: Message shown in the sidebar if there are no tab collections yet.

collectionTitle.description: Title of the collection containing the number of tabs, the number placholder may refer to one or more tabs.

restoreTabsButtonTitle.description: Title of the button for restoring a tab collection.

removeTabsButtonTitle.description: Title of the button for removing a tab collection.

removeTabTitle.description: Title of the button for removing a tab from a collection.

incognitoModeMessage.description: Message shown in the sidebar when in incognito mode.
